name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? 2
name_original: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? 2
description:
Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? 2 is a game developed by Buena Vista Interactive. It was originally released in 2000. It was published by Buena Vista Interactive. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? 2 is available on PC.
